source.ce99ce5a:
W = list()
I = list()

for i in t:
    w = a+i*b
    status = True
    for baris in w:
        if baris < 0:
            status = False
    if status == False:
        continue
    W.append(w)
    I.append(i)
o = t.index(I[-1])
o = o+1
W.append(a+t[o]*b)
I.append(t[o])

for j in range(len(I)):
    print(I[j],W[j])
    print('\n')
source.b8ae9250:
W = list()
I = list()
for i in t:
    w = a+i*b
    W.append(w)
    I.append(i)
    
for j in range(len(W)):
    print(I[j],W[j])
    print('\n')
    if sum(sum(W[j]<0)) > 0:
        break
source.68d9bd8f: $w = a+(t*b)$ dengan $0 \leq t < 0.25$ berjalan dan berhenti ketika ada baris di $w$ yang bernilai negatif
